description.narrative: Intermediate Results (IR) 029: Increased evidence based public engagement on children's issues to fuel social engagement, support shifts in public perception, action and change., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 8: Policy analysis and advocacy, M&E, and Communications: Policy analysis and advocacy, M&E, and external Communications are based on evidence, linked to functional M&E systems, and are used to reduce child poverty and encourage equitable development.

description.narrative: 3.8 million people reached, of which 2.8 million through social media. Ghana at top of UNICEF West and Central Africa Region social media rankings. First summit for student journalists on ethical reporting of children launched. External Communication led engagement with private sector companies to support newborn care. | Status:Met | As-of Date:21/12/2017
